backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend canister with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence removal tasks: removing CertificationsGallery from App.tsx, and deleting both CertificationsGallery.tsx and CertificateModal.tsx component files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including component descriptions, with entries for CertificationsGallery (54 certification images with modal) and CertificateModal (full-screen image viewer with navigation).
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the portfolio application with viewport meta tag, title 'Jerry Osiobe Portfolio', and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component rendering the portfolio layout with nine section components (Hero, Professional Summary, Core Competencies, Education, Professional Certifications, Professional Experience, Research Papers, Interests, Footer) in a responsive container.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Empty file placeholder for a certificate modal component that was previously used for full-screen certificate image viewing.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Empty file placeholder for a certifications gallery component that previously displayed 54 certification images in a grid with modal functionality.
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: Displays nine core technical competencies in a responsive grid with icons (Wrench, Pencil, Shield, etc.) and hover effects, covering project management, AutoCAD, cybersecurity, data analytics, and other skills.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: Lists three educational qualifications (B.Eng, OND, SSCE) in card format with graduation cap icons, institution names, and years.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice for current year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters and heart icon.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with gradient background, profile image, engineer's name and credentials (MNSE, COREN), contact information (email, phone, location), and download CV button.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: Displays five personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) as cards with icons in a centered, wrapped flex layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: Organizes professional certifications into six categories (Engineering Memberships, Project Management, Data & AI, Cybersecurity, Process Improvement, Technical Courses) displayed in a two-column grid with category icons.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Displays a timeline of professional work experiences with company names, job titles, periods, and responsibilities. Includes a visual timeline with dots and cards for each position.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Renders a centered professional summary section with a brief overview of engineering expertise, skills, and professional strengths.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists research papers and publications with titles and DOI links, displaying them in styled cards with external link icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the portfolio uses static content without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, typography styles, and utility classes including a grid pattern background.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH colors, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and keyframe animations for accordions and fade effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Ebruvwiyor Osiobe with 15 implemented features including hero section, professional summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience timeline, publications with DOI links, and interests sections. The single-page portfolio uses smooth scrolling navigation and includes contact information with downloadable CV.
